title: IBM zCodeFormatSettings
description: JSON schema for zcodeformat.yaml or zcodeformat.json code formatter preferences files. Version 0.0.1 -- Licensed Materials - Property of IBM - (c) Copyright IBM Corporation 2022. All Rights Reserved.

enableIndentation.description:
Enable indentation of record descriptions
If false, startOfAreaA and indentLength are not allowed

endOfAreaB.description:
End of Area B

If -1, will use Margin R as the end of Area B

lineWrappingStyle.description: If indentation moves code beyond Area B

startOfAreaA.description:
Start of Area A
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false

indentLength.description:
Indent Length
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false

startOfAreaA.description:
Start of Area A
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false

startOfAreaB.description:
Start of Area B
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false

indentMultipleLineStatements.description:
Multiple line statement indent length
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
use -1 to disable

alignLists.description:
Align lists
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false

indentForAllBlocks.description:
Fixed indent length to use for all blocks
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
Cannot be used with other individual block indent values

indentAtEndBlock.description:
Indent length of AT END block
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
Cannot be used if indentForAllBlocks is used

indentAtEndOfPageBlock.description:
Indent length of AT END OF PAGE block
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
Cannot be used if indentForAllBlocks is used

indentExecBlock.description:
Indent length of EXEC block
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
Cannot be used if indentForAllBlocks is used

indentEndExecPhrase.description:
Indent END-EXEC phrase
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
END-EXEC phrase will be indented with Exec Block

indentIfBlock.description:
Indent length of IF block
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
Cannot be used if indentForAllBlocks is used

indentInvalidKeyBlock.description:
Indent length of INVALID KEY block
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
Cannot be used if indentForAllBlocks is used

indentNotAtEndBlock.description:
Indent length of NOT AT END block
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
Cannot be used if indentForAllBlocks is used

indentNotAtEndOfPageBlock.description:
Indent length of NOT AT END OF PAGE block
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
Cannot be used if indentForAllBlocks is used

indentNotInvalidKeyBlock.description:
Indent length of INVALID KEY
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
Cannot be used if indentForAllBlocks is used

indentNotOnExceptionBlock.description:
Indent length of NOT ON EXCEPTION block
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
Cannot be used if indentForAllBlocks is used

indentNotOnOverflowBlock.description:
Indent length of NOT ON OVERFLOW block
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
Cannot be used if indentForAllBlocks is used

indentNotOnSizeErrorBlock.description:
Indent length of NOT ON SIZE ERROR block
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
Cannot be used if indentForAllBlocks is used

indentOnExceptionBlock.description:
Indent length of ON EXCEPTION block
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
Cannot be used if indentForAllBlocks is used

indentOnOverflowBlock.description:
Indent length of ON OVERFLOW block
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
Cannot be used if indentForAllBlocks is used

indentOnSizeErrorBlock.description:
Indent length of ON SIZE ERROR block
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
Cannot be used if indentForAllBlocks is used

indentPerformBlock.description:
Indent length of PERFORM block
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
Cannot be used if indentForAllBlocks is used

indentWhenBlock.description:
Indent length of WHEN block
Cannot be used if enableIndentation is false
Cannot be used if indentForAllBlocks is used
